title: Electric mine locomotive control apparatus
abstract: Under date of December 18, 1929 the appointment of a joint sponsorship to develop American Standards for Electric mine locomotive control apparatus was approved. The sponsors designated are the National Electrical Manufacturers Association, the American Mining Congress and the A. I. E. E. The scope of the project as set up by American Standards Association will be as follows: Definitions, classifications, rating, methods of test for electric mine locomotive control apparatus.
